review.title: Great hotel! Nice staff and delicious food
review.reviewText:
Everything is so great except location. 
Taking uber to downtown is around $35. If you have a large group, it will work.
review.negativeRemarks: only location

review.title: Great end to a disappointing visit to San Francisc
review.reviewText: Cannot say enough about this hotel.  We had a two week vacation  from Denver through Reno, Tahoe, Yosemite, Mendocino, and ended up in San Francisco. We had just one short night at this hotel before catching an early flight.  We were victims of a Smash n Grab at the Cliff House Restaurant.  When we pulled up to this hotel, the attendant was quick to help our friend's car with repairing the broken window.  I believe his name was Edward but not sure, hope so because I want him to have personal recognition.  I work for a travel agency and I will recommend this hotel to anyone catching flights in and out of San Fran.  Everyone at the front desk was smiling and extremely friendly and helpful.  They all deserve kudos!!
review.positiveRemarks: Helpful, kind, clean, friendly, and exceptionally taken care of.
review.negativeRemarks: I cannot think of a thing!! Big applause to the management of this hotel.  We had several bad experiences on this trip but this helped redeem it.
review.locationRemarks: Convenient to airport with shuttles running 24/7 every 15 minutes!!

review.title: Convenient is a PLUS!
review.reviewText: Staffs were all friendly and  accommodating.  I like how the hotel included free airport shuttle to and from,  convenient shop with basic necessities are available near the front desk, and  how the hotel also keep your luggage is if you decide to spend a day after checking out.  I was just sad that the hotel did not  I was just sad that the hotel did not provide free breakfast to guests.  However overall experience was great!

review.title: Housekeeping
review.reviewText: The hotel itself is in a great location, within a few steps of the bay.  The hotel room was clean, but could have been a little cleaner.  I used the cups that were provided with the ice bucket, however, housekeeping failed to replace them before the second night.  Housekeeping was good about providing extra coffee upon request.

review.title: hard to access from route not signs bad staff
review.reviewText: The hotel is too far from the route, there is not directions or signs. If you arrive late you get lost and there is another hotel with same name in the area. Staff not helpful, no close places for dinning close bay. Ugly area.
review.negativeRemarks: Signs to help you when driving at night, or the staff being helpful or knowing directions
review.locationRemarks: Ugly, in construction,   complicated to access to, no shopping dinning options too far away from downtown

review.title: Overnight
review.reviewText: Handicap parking spaces right in front of the hotel could not be used according to the staff. They stated that they were only for 15 minute checkin. There were no other handicap spaces within a short distance to the hotel entrance. Something wrong with being unable to use a handicap designated spot over night. Believe this is unlawful. May checkin and stay very disappointing. Room was really dark and furnishing worn. However the bed was very comfortable and clean. Would try another hotel near the airport next time.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to the airport and short trip to return rental car.
review.negativeRemarks: Lighting in the suite I stayed in. Training of the staff in the use of handicap spaces.

review.reviewText:
Staff where very helpful 
They helped with booking my tours

review.title: Below what expected
review.reviewText: There is a 25 dollar fee for parking even as a guest. The air conditioner leaked water and long waiting lines at check in. No directions to room were given and were not told two separate elevators designated to two different building , if wrong one picked , no connection to get to right room number. But room bathroom was nice .

review.title: not good staff, reception
review.reviewText: the shuttle bus driver, reception, door service bad. will not stay next timr

review.title: It was nice and clean .
review.reviewText: Nice place I definitely recommend it . The rooms are big and comfortable .

review.title: Thank you Cyrus!
review.reviewText: We stayed here while visiting SF. We drove for 12 hrs before arriving at approx 9p. We stopped for dinner at Mel's diner on Lombard prior to checking in as My family was exhausted. Although we parked in a lit lot and our suv was in view we were robbed and our vehicle windows were busted. When we eventually got to the hotel Cyrus at the front desk was very welcoming and made us feel at home. He made sure we had what we needed to make sure our stay was comfortable. The hotel allowed us to park out front over night as our windows were broken. Every time we walked into the hotel the front desk said hello or welcome back. Cyrus checked on us to make sure we were ok. The warm cookies were a nice touch. I am definitely staying here again. Thank you Double Tree!

review.title: In s great location.
review.reviewText: I never stayed, because I did not receive a confirmation from Expedia.

review.title: Review
review.reviewText: It was a clean kept room. Bed was comfy, pillows could've been a little former but it was comfortable. Friendly guest check in. Only thing was our cars wouldn't let us in the gate for parking at first. When we finally got up to our room, the view wasn't what we expected. And we tried calling the front lobby and had my fiancé on hold for about 5 minutes before I told him to just hang up. Overall though, it was a nice one night stay, quiet, clean and comfortable. I wouldn't stay more than one night though.

review.title: Nice
review.reviewText: Room was Clean and very nice staff.  Bay view could be better

review.title: Nice get away
review.reviewText: Perfect for a weekend getaway with my husband, we walked around and had a wonderful.

review.title: First Trip
review.reviewText: There was a lot of road construction going on near the hotel. I arrived around 10:30 am, somewhat early on an east coast flight and was surprised to find that my room was ready. Ms. Mo at the front desk was polite and friendly and I was greeted with a warm chocolate cookie. I was very hungry so I hit the breakfast buffet it was going to be closing at 11:00 am so I dived right in. My server was not the most friendly however. He brought my beverage and that was the last I saw of him until he brought the check. I was a little surprised when I heard one of the staff say to another guest that he "had three minutes" to eat! At $20 a head and hardly another guest in the restaurant that was a little rude. Save your money and don't bother with a "bay view" room. Yes, you can see the bay from your room and since the hotel is directly across the bay from SFO you hear and feel the blast of the thrust reverse as each jet lands at the airport.
review.positiveRemarks: Nice clean room and overall friendly staff.
review.negativeRemarks: I had a non-working alarm clock that was not replaced.
review.locationRemarks: Take the free shuttle bus back to the airport and then take BART to the city.

review.title: Expect to pay 24.00 for parking
review.reviewText: No jacuzzi no free parking/valet, nobody to give us a cart at check in. Not worth it

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: The service was good and the room was clean and comfortable.

review.title: Comfortable and clean
review.reviewText: We have stayed at this hotel in the past. We were happily surprised that the hotel has improved a lot in all areas of our stay!
thumbs up! very nice hotel .. friendly staff clean room, good location, very good ambiance

review.title: The night before Maui
review.reviewText: Comfortable clean quiet and a nice shuttle ride to the airport a most excellent stay a most excellent staff we will recommend the Doubletree to our friends .
adequate and great staff. bay walk close by is nice
review.negativeRemarks: spa/ saunna
review.locationRemarks: airport suttle gives access to other transportation

review.title: Saved money here using Expedia
review.reviewText: Attended an event at another hotel, but got a better rate at the Doubletree through Expedia. The price was the primary factor we stayed here and it was a bargain for what we received.

review.title: Super convenient
review.reviewText: Great service. Staff friendly and very helpful. Hilton honors members so they gave us warm cookies and bottled water.

review.title: Beautiful Hotel with Great View of Bay and Airport
review.reviewText: I really liked this hotel except for one thing.  It was VERY close to the airport.  I didn't realize it when I booked it unfortunately.  It was close enough that I could hear the planes landing and taking off.  However, I did only hear about three per night and a few in the morning.  I thought the San Fran Airport would be way busier, but it wasn't.  So all in all, the noise was aggravating about three times per morning and per night, for less than a minute, and everything else was great.
Pleasant hotel staff - one who assisted me though - I couldn't quite understand her, although she was pleasant and professional.
Had computer issues with check-in and check-out.  It's convenient to the airport with good shuttle service.
review.negativeRemarks: Ability to check-in and check-out without computer issues.  Had to sign a piece of paper with my email address for checkout.  Very unprofessional.

review.title: Great play and park Hotel!
review.reviewText: Nice clean hotel that works well with flying out of SF and leaving Car!
review.positiveRemarks: The van driver went out of his way at the airport for us and is very safe and courtesy driver, give that man a raise.......

review.title: A satisfactory corporate experience
review.reviewText: Having just experienced a DoubleTree stay in Orlando (my first at this chain), I would just comment upon the nearly identical experience at SFO. It is fine: comfortable, adequate to great amenities, depending on your expectations. Everything is in place, but I lost track as to whether I was in Central Florida or in the Bay Area. Actually, this was a blessing, since Orlando is a horror show. So, if you need to know where the Kleenex box or the ice bucket is, you will be satisfied in checking in at this chain. I have to say, though, that the signature cookie upon check-in becomes very tiresome, especially since it is a mechanical act rather than an expression of sincerity. Anyhow, the cookie sucks …
review.negativeRemarks: Well. I objected to paying for every little thing, but that is the corporate model.
review.locationRemarks:
Orlando: the gross theme parks not withstanding, this location was only ten miles from the airport. Rental car advised.
SFO: a good stopover.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Very clean neat, great place to stay near sf. Price was better not that high compared to other places and the place look beautiful. and great place to walk around in the morning

review.title: Overall i was satisfied with my stay here!!!
review.reviewText:
The front desk was very nice especially during the second last time when I stayed (not so much as the last time) during which the manager Armado was very kind and accommodating to my request and the front desk was kind to check up on me with reservation, and she was kind to follow up after I checked out. Also, they give the best warm cookies ever!!! 
The front dest was very understanding and accommodating to room change request, due to noise pollution. 
And some things to improve- food in restaurant, cleaner towels, expedia gold member benefits.
review.positiveRemarks: request honored on a particular occasion,almost all of the front desk are nice,shuttle. warm cookies.
review.negativeRemarks: expedia gold members should get benefits (free or discounted parking, late checkout),clean towel,food in restaurant

review.reviewText: Front desk was very accomodating & welcome cookies was delicious. The check in process was quick so it was great. The room needs updating. Although I got the room I booked for which was a Bay view room, but it wasn"t peaceful or relaxing as we can clearly hear noise from the hallway which I guess happened to be the facilities or service area of the hotel. Size & cleaniness was good as expected it from that hotel. Parking was good. Overall hotel was ok.

Staff was very nice, it is in a pretty area although a little remote. Room was clean and bed comfortable. I did find it fascinating that there was only a sheer on the window. The curtain only went half way across. I had to  leave at 3 a.m. so it wasn't an issue for me.

review.title: close to airport
review.reviewText: this hotel is close to SFO airport, has a shuttle to and from, warm cookies when you check in are a plus. The staff were very nice and accommodating. A lot of the airlines use this hotel for there pilots and staff.

review.title: clean and easy access to airport
review.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised  as rooms were well appointed, comfortable, clean and roomy. Fitness facility better than most similar hotels and  functional. Front desk staff very friendly and efficient at check in - food good but dining room organization and service poor - seemingly one server only on dining room for a busy March break Saturday evening ( he was doing his best to hustle and serve all tables while breakfast on Sunday ( despite more staff on duty ) took 15 minutes after being seated to even bring water and another 30 minutes from the time breakfast ( eggs) was  ordered to meal at the table.

review.title: Price misleading
review.reviewText:
Hotel located close to the airport. Unfortunately the hotel prices are very misleading.
Hotel charges for parking for guests. It also charges for the clubhouse fee for using the swimming pool and other recreational activities.
The rooms are very small as compared to other hotels of same class and under lit.
The bathroom however is clean and well lit
review.negativeRemarks: Transparency and room condition
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport and regular airport shuttles

review.reviewText: The water pressure for the shower it's sucks. But the room is nice, the only thing I don't like is in the middle of the night there were noise at the hallway outside my room which kept me up for a good 45 mins. While checking out at the front desk representative girl did not even ask me how was my stay, I wanted her to ask me so that I could say something about the noise. But she didn't. Other than that, the hotel was okay.
Awesome experience, but the staff took forever to check in guests and were in a hurry they forgot to even give me a receipt.

review.title: Better than average airport hotel.
review.reviewText: Good food, good bar, pleasant jazz trio at the restaurant, long term parking.
review.positiveRemarks: Good food, good bar, pleasant jazz trio at the restaurant, long term parking. Restaurant is big, spacious.
review.negativeRemarks: Rooms could still be better, especially beds. But they are still slightly better than other SFO hotel bedrooms.
review.locationRemarks: Go to the airport. The small hotel buses are new and very comfortable.

review.title: Quiet, comfortable, and decently priced hotel
review.reviewText: Comfortable, quiet, and decently priced hotel if you are looking for something not too far from SF.
Room was comfortable. Staff was friendly and efficient.

review.title: It was adequate.
review.reviewText: Not what I expect a Hilton or even a Doubletree hotel to be.

review.title: Comfortable, clean and close to SFO
review.reviewText: The only things missing were a fridge and microwave in the room. I usually choose a hotel with a pool and free breakfast. Aside from these four items, this hotel met &/or exceeded expectations. Professional, kind and welcoming staff accommodated us fully. This is our second stay at this hotel.

review.title: Nice hotel to the airport
review.reviewText: Hotel employees were very kind in giving us tips on getting around San Francisco.
review.positiveRemarks: Free and frequent shuttle bus service from and to the airport was useful to get a connection to the downtown San Francisco.
review.negativeRemarks: Facilities were a little rusty, but it was OK.
review.locationRemarks: If you are interested in visiting Stanford University and the downtown area of San Francisco, the hotel is right in the middle of the two.

review.title: Love it!
review.reviewText: We loved the hotel it was very clean! They was nice!

review.title: Nice hotel on the Bay.
review.reviewText:
The Doubletree usually means an excellent place to stay. This is a nice hotel, room was clean, beds comfortable, coffee and tea service, and mini fridge in room were terrific. Only problem was that out room was not cleaned the first day we were there. Also, no one came to collect our dishes and trays from room service even after I had called and requested they be picked up. We did put everything outside, but they stayed in the hallway until the following evening. That is just bad form. 
The shower head was also terrible in that it was hard to use without getting water all over the bathroom. At one point it fell and broke apart completely and sprayed water everywhere. They need better quality fixtures for what they charge to stay there. I'm not sure I would stay at this particular Doubletree again considering how many other good hotels are in the area.

review.title: Great Deal
review.reviewText: We had a very enjoyable stay at this nice clean hotel near the airport.
Easy check-in, with friendly and helpful staff.  Great impression when entering the hotel, with a nice openness to the entrance and following dining/relaxing areas.
review.positiveRemarks: I enjoyed the openness of the lobby/bar/eating areas, along with the modern rooms.
review.locationRemarks: The location has good views and easy on and off the freeway.  You do have to drive to restaurants.

review.title: Nice.... Beyond nice...
review.reviewText:
Stayed there a night before early flight, parked my car there for the duration of my trip. It was a Saturday night, went to the lobby restaurant to eat dinner and was pleasantly surprised by live entertainment. Great saxophone player, great band. Enjoyed the evening very much.
The staff is efficient, the room is clean, the shuttle is prompt. Highly recommend.

review.title: Exactly as advertised.
review.reviewText: Great hotel.  No compliants.  Clean room, friendly and professional hotel staff.
review.negativeRemarks: Perhaps some renovations.
review.locationRemarks: Nearby SFO airport, so a bit too far from any major activities.

review.title: Business trip
review.reviewText: I've never stayed at this particular location. But I have stayed in Doubletree's before, so I figured it would be OK. It was very nice the room was very clean and the gentleman at the front desk was excellent and friendly. Definitely recommend it to others.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Everything was as I expected except for the water pressure in the shower. Pressure for some reason was lower than normal. I was too tired to go and request for a different room.
review.positiveRemarks: Nice view of the bay just around the hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: Definitely the shower water pressure needs to checked and adjusted.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport.

review.title: 3.5 star hotel with 4 star price
review.reviewText: Hotel is not bad if you think of it as a 3.5 star hotel.  However, their room fees is comparable to 4 star hotels like Marriott and Hyatt.  Despite the rooms are newly renovated, there is no vent in bathroom.  No toilet paper rolls was put in upon checkin. No porter service upon my arrival or departure.  The room service food is disappointing!  I surely would not go there again for that price.

review.title: Unplanned stay in San Francisco
review.reviewText: We missed our connecting flight (thanks to the inept United Airlines).  Anyway, we got help from Expedia to book into this hotel.  Great location and close to the airport.  Great rate and an unadvertised jog path along the waterway.  It really took the edge off.  Heaven forbids, if you ever got stuck in San Francisco.....
review.negativeRemarks: Parking is a mess.  It is difficult and confusing.
review.locationRemarks: Jogging along the water front.  Just cross the street and it is all there.

review.title: Nice hotel. Close to airport.
review.reviewText: Hotel was a nice value and easy access to airport.

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: It was easy to get to, great location for restaurants and shops with easy on and off the highway. Love the way the free shuttle takes you straight to  at the airport so you didn't have to find driving and parking in the city. the only downside we found where the walls seem to be a little thin and the sound of people in the hallways. But the staff was above and beyond excellent.
Enjoyed the location to attraction and scenery of bay. The large seating and dining were great amenities.
Decent stay. Faced issues once with room key validation and once with parking validation. Staff could be more friendlier
Good location...planes were pretty loud though but overall worth it as way cheaper than staying in the city.

review.title: Things started out rocky but the staff made it all
review.reviewText:
I was given a room that was already occupied but then was given a new room, a voucher for a free breakfast, & extra cookies. They also, agreed to sign for 1 of my bags that was delayed and scheduled to be delivered after I checked out.
Each staff member that I encountered i.e. bar tender, room cleaners, shuttle driver etc... had a great 'can do' attitude.

We booked last minute when a flight was canceled and we had to drive up to SFO late at night. The front desk was great - he upgraded us to a nicer room and allowed us to keep our car parked right in front since we were only staying for about 4 hours. Room was comfortable. A good place to rest after a stressful journey.

review.title: location is very good to SF and airoport.
review.reviewText: Staffs are very nice and helpful, but bed is too small for me and my kinds, air conditioner is too loud. There is no microwave provided unless requested, and no more available for us when we were there. The staff let us used one in crew loungue. Thanks.
review.positiveRemarks: location, nearby the sea, easy to access to HWY.
review.negativeRemarks: list for the hotel services.
review.locationRemarks: nearby the sea, easy to access to HWY.

review.title: Awesome
review.reviewText: Simply awesome .  Got exactly what I expected .  Good room , good staff etc....  The parking is not free but I still think it's worth it .  I think the parking thing was the only thing that was a bummer .  Everything else was just awesome

review.title: Great place, perfect location
review.reviewText: I was looking for a place near San Francisco and near Santa Clara, the location is perfect and the staff more than great!!!
review.negativeRemarks: The elevators were broken the day we arrived, so we had to use the service elevator, more than that, there is nothing I would change

review.reviewText:
TV. Coffee maker. Desk light are out of order. Plug is not connected.
Carpets are dusty.
It was a great place,  very close to airport, and many eating locations.  I would definitely stay here again

review.title: Near airport
review.reviewText: The stay was nice and the warm cookies when you check was a nice touch, The rooms were clean and comfortable. The front desk staff are very helpful and friendly.
review.negativeRemarks: The parking is not great. I am not sure why we have to pay to park, should be included in price. Also the garbage area was really gross.

review.title: Very comfortable & convenient
review.reviewText: Hotel is located very conveniently near the SFO airport.  Beds were wonderfully comfortable.  Hotel staff are extremely kind and helpful. Room and bath were perfectly clean and nicely decorated.  Definitely a good place to stay.  Only suggestions are to add a chef salad to menu, and perhaps one or two vegetable-rich menu dinner items. Oh!  And having breakfast included with room is something that is getting to be expected these days.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfortable bed, great bath towels, lovely view from room window.
review.negativeRemarks: Restaurant menu should offer more vegetable items and free breakfast with room.

review.title: Actually was pretty nice.Buuutttt...
review.reviewText: Hotel presented nice. Rooms were nice. Just showed age by old ac units and popcorn ceilings. Carpets had stains. Not complaining though. Only issue I had was the late night desk guy was short with us and did not explain any amenities or point out where ice would be, etc.

review.title: close to Airport and Scenic views
review.reviewText: Cozy and comfortable quiet and very airport accessible.  It's pretty much in an isolated, remote area off airport, so don't expect much outside of hotel.  However, the dining room for breakfast and PEET'S coffee the best.
review.positiveRemarks: That behind the hotel also, there's soccer fields and a fast food Mexican restaurant to die for!  Some of the best Mexican food I've had in years.

review.reviewText: Not bad if staying for a night. Little pricey if you add in parking $22 and in room wifi.

review.title: Nice hotel close to San Francisco and SFO
review.reviewText:
Nice hotel and comfortable room and bed. 
Was disappointed that there is no swimming pool.

review.title: Perfect travel hotel near SFO
review.reviewText:
gracious welcoming staff
tasty, timely homemade cookie snack
convenient, regular airport shuttle
plenty spacious room 
speedy elevator
and LOVED LOVED LOVED being able to walk across the street and take a lovely walk along the water, seeing a few interesting shorebirds, planes landing and taking off vs. being stranded in the middle of highways
there also seemed to be a bike path right there

review.title: Luxurious wait for a flight
review.reviewText: The hotel is well-appointed.  Dining room/bar struck just the right balance of casual and sophistication.  The food was delicious, and the waitstaff was helpful and efficient.  The room was very comfortable and contained everything we needed.  I wish I needed to stay more than one night.
review.positiveRemarks: Everything.  In-house dining, delicious food, excellent service.  The shuttle bus to the airport was comfortable and efficient.  The room was lovely.

review.reviewText: had frequent shuttle service to SFO. shuttles to SFO were not dedicated so you had to pay attention to what bus you were boarding, but otherwise everything was what I would expect of the doubletree. The breakfast buffet was good, the food seemed to be turned over fairly quickly, but drinks were a little skimpy though.

review.title: Nice hotel, but...
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel however, not even a  continental breakfast?? The one across the street for a few $$ more gives you a buffet breakfast. 😳 I didn't stay there cause they were completely booked for my weekend.

review.title: shuttle saved the day
review.reviewText: The shuttle was a great service that got us to where we needed to go that was an important factor in picking the hotel! The staff was EXCELLENT in recommending where to go and do as well as how to get there. Rooms where clean and comfortable and the whole staff was professional and pleasant.

review.title: OK but a little tired and in need of remodelling
review.reviewText: Worst part of the stay was the wait for a shuttle from the airport. They are supposed to run every 15 minutes, but after 30 minutes i rang the hotel and was told it was at the next terminal and would be with me shortly. 15 minutes later it arrived and the driver started by telling me i would have to wait for the next one as he couldn't take any more luggage (the bus was full of United flight crew). I said that was not going to happen and he agreed to put the luggage on. The hotel itself is OK but while we were there it was being used predominantly by flight crew on stop overs, so the shuttles were always full and the reception often busy. Staff were pleasant although a complaint about the shuttle was brushed aside. Rooms are also dated, the shower had no pressure and the toilet constantly blocked. Would try a different brand (probably Marriott) next time
review.negativeRemarks: Get the shuttles working on time and spend some money updating
review.locationRemarks: Typical airport hotel on a strip outside the airport. Good diner (Leanne's) next door. Nothing else around

review.title: Cheap stay but expensive added charges.
review.reviewText: We booked one night. We were greeted by a nice woman who gave my kids cookies. We then we're told it would be 22 dollars to park for the night. The room was clean. The beds were small. It had a weird odor. We also had a view of the parking lot/ bay. You can hear the planes coming and going from the near by airport.There is no pool, but you can use one at a near by hotels. The breakfast buffet was over priced at 17 a person. Nothing spectacular. Then we got charged 15 dollars extra for a san francisco tax? Check out was awkward. I was asked do you want a receipt. I answered yes, the front desk attendant printed it handed it to me and helped the next person around me. No thank you and no goodbye. Overall not that great. Splurge a lititle more and go for a better hotel near by. You will end up spending just as much with the double tree add ons.

review.title: Good value hotel
review.reviewText: Overall good but hotel room was stuffy & needed air freshener, also there were kids fingerprints all over the window so other than that it was fine

review.title: Staff was less than desirable
review.reviewText:
If you take the shuttle to/from the airport - be prepared that airline staff comes first!  I was set aside on both my arrival and departure so that the shuttle driver would take care of airline staff - even though I was the first in line.  I booked through expedia and the staff was not helpful in addressing any of the concerns that I had in what I believe was an error.  
The bed was very comfortable.
Had to go to another floor to get ice as the ice machine on our floor was not working.  
For the price, I think the service could have been MUCH better.

review.title: Lovely accommodations.
review.reviewText: Wonderful accommodations with wonderful staff, clean room, great food and easy access to the airport.

review.title: Comfortable, convenient hotel for overnight stay
review.reviewText:
I had an early morning flight so I was looking for a basic hotel close to SFO. This hotel exceeded my expectations given the low price I paid for it. The room was spacious, very clean, and the bed was quite comfortable. It also had a number of thoughtful touches that a lot more expensive hotels miss out on such as reading lamps so you can read without disturbing your partner, power plugs right next to bed to charge your phone or laptop, and a nice large desk. And as an unexpected bonus, my room had a view of the bay!

There was one problem I ran into. A little after midnight, a loud rattling noise started up outside. The noise seemed to be coming from the vending machine or the icemaker in the corridor. The in-room phone wasn't working, so I had to call the front desk using my cellphone to report the problem. The noise stopped within 5-10 minutes of me reporting it, so their response to my complaint was prompt. A little more maintenance seems to be called for.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel outside of San Francisco downtown area, however the view of the bay is across the street and so not what expected

review.title: Weekend getaway
review.reviewText: The beds are very comfortable but room a little too small. Continental breakfast should be included but they made up for it a little bit by providing free shuttle to and from airport. Enjoyed having free trolley as well, from the hotel although the driver almost gave me whiplash! Overall I enjoyed my stay.

review.title: Close to airport, obviously.
review.reviewText: Nice upscale hotel. Only surprise was a $20 charge for parking. In the city I expect it...out in the suburbs, not so much. It's not like there's a lot of competition for parking in the area of this hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Upscale and modern. Nothing to really complain about.

review.reviewText: Area of hotel was convenient, staff from banquet , to room service and front desk  was very pleasant during my entire stay. I also stayed at the Doubletree in Seattle I enjoyed it there too. I would not stay at any other hotel other than Doubletree.  Thank you so much my family and I enjoyed our stay.

review.title: nice and quite ...
review.reviewText: it was comfortable, clean, friendly staff, and over all nice but to me its more of a 3 star not 4 star hotel ...
review.negativeRemarks: don't face building across from each other so rooms don't have to face each other ... so everyone can have a beautiful view.

review.title: Great location for going north or south on 101
review.reviewText: Great staff. Helpful and friendly. There was not a day were the front desk or Dennis the door man did not greet us with a smile ,hello and how are you. Even when they had a large number of people checking in, I was having a problem with my room key, the person at the front desk saw me and called me over to ask if they could help me. What would have been an hour at another hotel...took 2 mins.
review.positiveRemarks: The location was great. If you were going north or south on 101 or connecting to 280, the ramps are right there.
review.negativeRemarks: The pizza at the restaurant. It is an Artisan Pizza. Extra small for $ 14.00.
review.locationRemarks: You are 14 miles from down town SF. San Jose is 35 mins.

review.title: Six hour stay what can I say?
review.reviewText:
Checked in, no smiles. Took ca r back to airport early, car park a nightmare in the dark. Exit is via car park entrance.
On way back courtesy bus driver was adamant he wasn't going to the double tree Hilton. Signs all over the bus. He tried to drive off while someone was loading suitcases and we sneaked on. In the end two pilots got off at next terminal and the remaining 8 passengers got off at the Hilton?? Surreal stuff?

review.title: Incredibly Helpful and Friendly Staff
review.reviewText: Our stay was a totally positive experience.  The staff could not have been more helpful.  They were friendly, helpful, and professional in their appearance and demeanor.  They were "top-notch" in all regards and a credit to your hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: The comfort, the staff, layout, etc.
review.negativeRemarks: While the bellhops were helpful, I tend to want to ask for that assistance instead of them presuming that I need it.  But that was a minor concern.
review.locationRemarks: We were there to stay the night in anticipation of flying out the next morning.  Since it was close to downtown SF, it was convenient for a visit.

review.title: TV was very outdated. They charge for parking
review.reviewText: they nickle and dime you for everything. The Tv barely worked. On the other hand it was very clean and comfortable.

review.title: Great Staff
review.reviewText: We arrived at the hotel late in the afternoon on Saturday Aug 8 after our car had been broken into down by Ghiradelli Square and my daughter's laptop and camera had been stolen. Our bellhop Edward could see that my daughter was upset.  He asked if she was ok. After telling him about the issue he made a trip back to our room with a voucher for some food and/or beverage. Edward went out of his way to make sure we had a great stay. His kind gesture helped my daughter to see that there are thoughtful caring people. We will always remember his thoughtfulness.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff. Our Bellhop Edward and waiter Jesus were both very friendly and a pleasure to converse with.

review.reviewText: The salmon special was very good in the hotel restaurant.
review.negativeRemarks: The lighting in the room could be improved - too dim - especially for older travelers.

review.title: Convenient location for short stay .well connected
review.reviewText: We had a great time in San Fransisco. Lots to see and do.  Very tourist friendly city.

review.title: Great stay close to airport
review.reviewText: We moved to this hotel to be close to airport for early Sunday morning flight. They made it easy for us, we were able to return our rental card then catch the hotel shuttle back on Saturday evening. Dinner at the hotel was wonderful.  We enjoyed the live music at the bar and during dinner.  Our hotel shuttle was timely getting is to our flight early.

review.title: NEXT TO THE BAY
review.reviewText: This is a great hotel and awesome if your one that LOVES to walk, jog, run or enjoy the scenery. My view was of the bay and the SF Airport.  The hotel location is not too far from Coyote Point Recreation and just 5 minutes to the mall!!!!  I would recommend this hotel cause of it's cleanliness and great location, plus the STAFF is awesome.

review.title: Reasonable hotel accommodations close to airport.
review.reviewText: The location for travelers is great as its near the airport, our room however was fairly small and the beds we had were old.  Our mattress sagged significantly and with the small double beds, we ended up rolling to the middle all night.  The room size is part of the price and nature of the hotel for business, the old mattress we did not feel was on par with the expectations for the price, we had better mattresses at small motels and never worse at nicer hotels.  Assuming this was not the norm, the hotel was well kept.
The hotel staff were very pleasant.  They explained how to use the hotel key with parking.  We wanted to visit the Golden Gate Bridge.  We were given directions and literature.
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel is next to the bay.  People were walking and jogging along the coast.  The hotel has a coffee shop and breakfast or dinner.
review.locationRemarks: The airport is nearby.  You can hear the airplanes take off and see them landing.

review.title: Hotel well kept, very clean, nice.
review.reviewText: All the hotel staff was friendly and professional. It was very clean and well kept.

Overall good experience. Breakfast was NOT impressive at all and not worth $17.50 per head cost. Pool is good and Vending machines did not work. I paid for 2 water bottles, when the machine did not work, I went to the lobby and they gave me two bottles of water and not ready to hear about the request to fix the machine as others may also be facing the same issue. Not good attitude!

review.title: Good hotel overlooking water
review.reviewText: This is a decent middle of the road hotel.  Safe area.  When we stayed there there were families, professional people on business, and an airline flight crew staying at the hotel.  They give out free double tree hotel cookies.  Parking is $22 per day.

review.title: Nice hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: We checked in to the hotel really late and the kids were extremely hungry. The staff was so kind to help to find food and heated up for us.

review.title: Will use this hotel again when visiting SF
review.reviewText: We stayed for 2 nights. Hotel was in good location. The complimentary cookies after check in was a nice treat. Modern hotel, room and bed were clean and very comfortable. Check in and check out was very quick. I recommend this hotel and much better to get a bay view room.

review.title: Nice hotel by the airport, but far from downtown
review.reviewText: The room was clean and nice.  The only real drawback is paying for parking $20 per night.
review.negativeRemarks: Free parking

review.title: Dated but good
review.reviewText: We booked the park-stay-fly package through Expedia and it worked out really well--especially since we were leaving the car for almost two weeks.  Staff was great throughout--checking in our car, shuttling us to the airport, checking us in when we returned and checking us out the next morning.  Restaurant food was really nicely done, much better than we expected, and of course the warm, mega-calorie welcome cookies were wonderful.  Parts of the hotel seem rather dated, but the bathroom seemed recently renovated (though I got only a lukewarm shower in the morning) and everything appeared clean.

review.title: Convenient to airport
review.reviewText: Helpful and friendly staff from front deck to restaurant. Very clean and comfortable.
The hotel is south of San Francisco.  Convenient for the airport. Not many places to eat around there.  Staff very nice, hotel comfortable.
Excellent. Friendly staff. Ckean rooms. No problems

review.title: Very nice place and clean.
review.reviewText: The hotel is very nice and clean. Close to beach and airport. I will love to stay there again.

review.title: Nice hotels quiet and comfortable
review.reviewText: The experience was good there was no noisy traffic or people.. The rooms where clean and comfortable.

review.title: No perks...for the price.
review.reviewText: Pay for parking? Ridiculous. They also have no complimentary breakfast. They do have a pricey restaurant. Ice machine located only on the fourth floor. Walked in to my room to the burnt out light bulbs and empty boxes on my bed...no very satisfied with this pricey hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: View of the water if you are put on the right side.
review.negativeRemarks: Free parking, complimentary breakfast?
review.locationRemarks: Location was great. Easy to get to from Hwy 101.

review.title: Excellent
review.reviewText: Staff was very friendly and professional. Rooms were very clean. Will come back again on my next bisit.
Kids loved the free cookies. Would be excellent if had a pool :)
I'm sure your hotel is a high traffic so I understand. Overall it was good, just not impressive or overly clean. It represented the high number of people that come through.
I was very happy with the condition of this hotel, staff was very helpful and nice. I have no complains!

review.title: Great stay for San Fran downtown
review.reviewText: Would definitely stay here again if doing a trip to San Fran as the hotel is roomy spacious and clean and you are guaranteed a fpgood night sleep.mpatking only cost $10 per night, ask for a discount.....and the shuttle takes you straight to the BART for an easy 30min train to downtown. Hotel staff very friendly and helpful, perfect
review.negativeRemarks: Free parking for guests
review.locationRemarks: Location well serviced by free shuttles and BART

review.title: Nice hotel close to airport and beach
review.reviewText: Overall, it was great. We booked a king room, but we were given two doubles. The evidently overworked but friendly clerk gave us free breakfast coupons--which was very nice, except the eggs were just awful. Nevertheless, a worthwhile stay for the budget and quality.

review.title: Comfortable & Friendly Staff
review.reviewText: Pleased with our stay here.  The front staff were very friendly and professional.  When we checked in the roller way was already in the room.
Hotel Was  ok not great , staff was not real friendly

review.title: comfortable
review.reviewText: hotel was great and nice bar although I don't drink it was in a nice area right off san fran bay
review.locationRemarks: near nice area and airports

review.title: Nice hotel to the airport
review.reviewText: The hotel is convenient to the airport. I took the shuttle bus from the airport on the 11th April  and arrived at the hotel at about 9pm. Everything went well after I had checked in until 3am in the morning when the fire alarm went on without stopping. People on my floor came out and took their belongings and went downstairs and thought there was a fire going on in the hotel as the speakers on every floor in the hotel asked us to leave our rooms as soon as possible. However, when I got to the lobby and was told that it was a false alarm that someone for no reason pushed a fire alarm button. The staff did not apologise to us and just asked us to go back to our rooms. I found it ridiculous that how such a five stars hotel as this could let something like that happen. This incident worried me about their security involved. The next day, people like me felt very tired but had to check out at usual time. The hotel did not give us any compensation for making us very convenient  the night before. The hotel is ok  but I don't think I  would not come back again.
review.negativeRemarks: Its security
review.locationRemarks: Near the airport.

review.title: SFO airport stay
review.reviewText: Expedia messed up # of rooms booked so created a hassle with regards to being able to get booked in and set for travel the next day.  Staff helped but left it to myself to get things corrected instead of going out of the way to make it right.  Although Expedia was at fault, staff should have been more empathetic in getting things corrected.  It seemed as though the hotel was full, but then a handicapped room became available at the last minute!  I then had to drop my rental off and waited over 30 minutes for their shuttle back to the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and had a good restaurant.
review.negativeRemarks: Personal interaction with guests.
review.locationRemarks: Nothing nearby, stranded in the airport area.

review.title: Bad customer service!
review.reviewText: This hotel made me so disappointed. It ruined my respect to the hotel name. Here's what happened: we checked in at 4 pm and requested for a roll-away bed but it never came. I followed up 4 times, talked to them in person and called in the phone but they kept saying that they're gonna bring it to our room but they never did. What a night! We drove all the way from San Diego, we're very tired and we were expecting to have a nice and relax night but instead, it was terrible and disappointing! I was too tired to follow up and finally at 1 in the morning, we gave up!

review.title: Worst vacation ever!
review.reviewText: Found this hotel on Expedia for what I believed was a good deal, and I wish I never chose them. My families first time visiting SF and these people ruined it all. The man at the front desk "Cyrus" was extremely rude! he could careless about any of the people staying there, let alone even bothering to greet the people walking in. Our remote stopped working,  and all he did was give us anot her remote "i guess this one should work" then later in the night the replacement remote stopped working too. This is not a family hotel at all, since Cyrus will tell you to keep your 4 and 5 year old kids to keep it down. The shuttle bus that takes you to the airport was late causing us to miss our flight. After calling the hotel back to help my family of 5 with another room for the night he just"  no" he didn't care at all that my children had to sleep in an airport. Then let me start on the workers that work the breakfast shift. The 2 young girls didn't even greet us instead continued on their cell phones, the look at me very rudely do you want to sit down. The chunky guy that I'm assuming is some sort of a manager since his shirt was different from the other employees had an attitude because we inquired about the breakfast buffet. Overall looks nice, but unless you want to deal with rude and inconsiderate people I would go down the street. The only worker that helped us was the bar tender, now he was great!

review.title: Hotel is not a great option. Last resort--no pun
review.reviewText: I booked the hotel because of its proximity to San Mateo Event Center. It is close, but will not offer you a respite from your busy business travels. Do NOT bother to get a "Bay View" room. First of all, the Bay is not that close. The window was so dirty, I could barely make out the water. Don't do the overpriced room service. Scrambled egg breakfast arrived cold. Better to go to 7-11 and get a takeout microwave burrito. Had a room that adjoined another room. Walls are paper thin. Heard every conversation from my stranger-neighbors. Not fun.  Overall, hotel felt dirty; hotel is a little cheaper than most in the area, but not worth it because you won't sleep or eat well.
review.negativeRemarks: Room service should deliver food at proper temperature; windows with bay view should be clean.
review.locationRemarks: There is nothing to do nearby. Only reason to book here is proximity to airport and to the San Mateo Event Center.

review.title: Nice hotel. Close to airport.
review.reviewText: Overall nice hotel. Close to the airport. One area if improvement would be for the front desk staff and the restaurant staff. Front desk, both times I came to the desk, were a bit snobby. This is the first impression of the hotel and you want to make sure the guest is welcomed. We had the breakfast buffet in the morning. The host seemed bothered with me. He then continued to goof around and chit-chatter with the other staff members.  The dining room was not busy at the time. If management  can improve these areas, Hotel would be rated the highest.

We waited for more than 30 minutes at the Terminal 2 for the shuttle. 
The wait was too long.
The AC in the room is still an old styled AC unit.

review.title: Nice Shuttle Bus!!
review.reviewText:
The comfortable complimentary shuttle bus from the airport to the hotel was a plus. I did feel the concierge needed some reviving, I checked in late evening and felt streamlined because many pilots and airline staff were checking in as well. The concierge did not ask many questions regarding accommodating my needs, they just checked me in and cut me a look when I asked for an additional cookie, the only thing that is “complimentary” compared to the other neighboring hotels.
 
In addition, there was a young lady, Sunday morning on Mother’s Day who worked at the bar, she was not very welcoming maybe even a little less mature, I was not partaking in the Mother’s Day brunch hosted by Doubletree but wanted some oatmeal, coffee and a piece of fresh fruit while enjoying the small jazz quartet, she seemed very short with me and never asked if my beverage was satisfying and for further assistance. Meanwhile, the day before, another lady, slightly older, was working as the host for the restaurant and the very kind, she was so very nice.
The room was ok, but not as modern as I anticipated. The stucco ceiling and décor seemed dated but the room and bathroom were clean. I was missing a remote to the television set and was under the impression that I had to switch the channels manually which I did on the first day. The Do Not Disturb placard was also missing.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfortable complimentary shuttle bus to and from airport.
review.negativeRemarks: Ensure all complimentary items are in the room, missing remote and do not disturb placard.
review.locationRemarks: Close to the airport

review.title: Just EXCELLENT.......I will for sure be coming bak
review.reviewText: This hotel was beyond excellent. Words can't describe how satisfied we were with our hotel stay. The staff were very friendly, room was super clean and comfy. We made this our hotel to stay every time we travel to San francisco. Although it is next to the airport, planes were not heard at all.

review.title: Perfect for SFO departures
review.reviewText: I stayed here just the night before my early morning flight from SFO. This is a great "last night in the Bay Area" hotel - convenient shuttle, well sound-proofed rooms and very close to the airport.  There are some great restaurants in the Burlingame area nearby (albeit, you would need a car to get to them).  Staff were very nice, prompt and professional.

review.title: Quick Overnight
review.reviewText: Heading to airport and stayed here the night before.  It was clean, quiet and the airport shuttle was on time.

review.title: Great choice close to SFO
review.reviewText:
Check in is at 3 pm. I arrived around 9:30 am and was told I had to check back at noon. This was difficult as I was being picked up for an outing and did not expect to be back until late evening. I spoke with the young lady at the front desk, Callie, and she accommodated me by finding a room that was available at that early hour. I really appreciated her helping me out!
Bed very comfortable and the shuttle is free and punctual, it runs 4 times per hour. Nice toiletries too. My #1 choice when overnighting in SFO!
review.locationRemarks: Very close to SFO

review.title: Easy to get to, off the fwy.
review.reviewText:
My group was very tired after a long day of sight seeing, it was nice to have our night end in a cozy room.
We especially liked the warm cookies!
review.positiveRemarks: Easy access to fwy, price is great, friendly staff.
review.negativeRemarks: We ate at the restaurant and it was really good but it took a while for our food to come out.
review.locationRemarks: The drive to the city is not too bad, and for the price of the hotel it is worth driving a few minutes south.

review.title: Great!
review.reviewText: Fantastic! Great hotel to stay. Close to almost everything.
Easy check in with warm chocolate chip cookies,who does this? Very clean room and extra helpful staff. Would recommend to all. Thank you for a great stay!
review.positiveRemarks: Everything , close to airport. Clean and comfortable, great staff.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Close to airport, easy to get to attractions .Fishermans Wharf, Union Square less than 30 min to get to.

review.reviewText: Staff friendly, had a great experience. I recommend it.

review.title: Great hotel, great service, a good night's rest
review.reviewText: The staff were very nice, helpful and efficient.  The hotel is in a nice location, clean and quiet.
review.positiveRemarks: It was comfortable and the staff was efficient.  I was very, very tired when I arrived.
review.locationRemarks: It's right by a nice walkway where you can walk by the water and watch the planes.

review.reviewText: One of the guys at the front desk was very rude over the phone.

review.title: Had an early flight out the next day...
review.reviewText: Hotel was nice, clean with a friendly staff.  Nice lobby/bar etc as well.

review.title: Terrible
review.reviewText: Worst double tree I've stayed at. Bathroom was filthy water in tub clogs, bed sheets dirty and appeared they haven't vacuumed. Not worth it keep driving.

review.title: Very good hotel
review.reviewText: Price was good, way cheaper than downtown but had to take BART LIGHT TRAIN to get downtown San Francisco, 17$ round trip but still cheaper than rent a car or get a downtown hotel and expensive parking . Free shuttle from and to airport. Bart station are at airport. Staff very nice and helpful and give fresh cookie every morning at front desk. Room very clean and safety in room. Nice restaurant and bar but I never use. My only complaint is hotel parking is not free, I had no car but anyway!

review.title: It was ok
review.reviewText: I stayed at the hilton garden inn and i enjoyed myself way more than.i did at this place it was crammed and i can.hear all the noise in the hallway the only nice thing bout it was the roll in bed i got cause the beds were too small for my boys i wont ever book here again
The hotel was really nice and the staff was great.  The food was really good but it was a little expensive.
review.negativeRemarks: The food was a little expensive.  I am use to staying in Double Trees which are suites and this one was not.
review.locationRemarks: It only took about 15 to 20 minutes to get there from the airport and that is just because of the traffic.

review.title: Flushing and key
review.reviewText: The Key for our room had to inserted six or seven times before door could be opened. The toilet would not flush properly. The hotel repairman was unable to correct the problem with the toilet. The staff did give us at no cost what we had ordered from room service ($18.00 ) and gave us a voucher for breakfast. That unfortunitely did not correct the fact we could not use the toilet in our room.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff did try to correct the problems and I would probably still stay there
review.negativeRemarks: Fix the toilet and the key problem
review.locationRemarks: The location was fine and we were there for just one night when we returned from Ireland.

review.title: Good value and convenient SFO location
review.reviewText:
Good, clean modern hotel at a decent price convenient (5min) away from SFO.
The on-site restaurant surprised us with exceptional good food -you tend to not expect that from "big box hotels" and at reasonable prices to boot. You do not need to leave and run around for food elsewhere. Also, friendly bar staff.
Only minor downside: no free parking, so be prepared to pay a nightly rate
review.positiveRemarks: Location to SFO, modern clean hotel and quality of food.
review.negativeRemarks: Provide free parking

managementResponses.response:
Thanks for staying with us at our hotel. I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you enjoyed 37 North Restaurant & Bar! I’ll be sure to share your comments with our staff.

See you soon,
Mike McKee
General Manager
DoubleTree by Hilton SFO

review.reviewText: Great stay. The restaurant at lobby is super good.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Heather,

Your comments about your stay at our hotel made us happy. We know it’s the little things that make your stay more comfortable (along with our great location).

We are sorry that we were unable to provide you with a pool on property. We hope the surrounding activities made up for this.

Hope to see you again soon!

Sincerely,
Mike McKee
General Manager

review.title: Very nice hotel but...
review.reviewText: This was a very nice hotel with great staff (in particular Dennis one of the bellman). He was overly accommodating and helpful lugging my 5 huge bags plus 4 smaller ones. My only complaint about this hotel is no swimming pool. We were able to walk to a small park with a great field to run in, and walk across the street to check out the ocean. We would stay here again.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Ray,

Your comments about your stay at our hotel made us happy. We know it’s the little things that make your stay more comfortable (along with our inviting new reception area).

We are sorry to hear there was an issue with our airport shuttle driver. Your comments have been forwarded to our Director of Front Office Operations to ensure this is taken care of immediately.

Hope to see you again soon!

Sincerely,
Mike McKee
General Manager

review.title: Perfect rate for parking for two weeks.
review.reviewText: I enjoyed these rates plus the reception area is awesome, very inviting. The bar scene had many different whiskeys. Even live music. The airport shuttle driver wasn't as accommodating for hotel guests,  but manager was kind enough.
review.positiveRemarks: Airport parking and shuttle, I always enjoy the watch cookie. :)
review.negativeRemarks: Attitude of shuttle driver.
review.locationRemarks: The restaurant at the driving range was awesome for beautiful presentation Mexican.

managementResponses.response:
Thanks for staying with us at our hotel. I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that 37 North Restaurant & Bar was satisfactory! I’ll be sure to share your comments with them.

Sincerely,
Mike McKee
General Manager

review.title: Close to SFO with shuttle
review.reviewText: Stayed overnight as had an early morning flight. Room was OK but the food in the restaurant was very good.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff was friendly and the restaurant was good.
review.negativeRemarks: There were a number of empty glasses along the hallway walls on the floor I was staying on and they were still there in the morning.

review.title: Convenient
review.reviewText: The staff at the restaurant was friendly and the food was good quality.  The receptionist at checkin whose name is Lakisha was not friendly.  She stated she was unable to locate my reservation and made the assumption I was at the wrong hotel, even though I show her my reservation email on my phone.

The lady working the front desk each morning my room key would not open the parking lot gate needs to work on her customer service skills.  I was not at all impressed.  Everyone else was very friendly.

review.title: 4 Star???
review.reviewText:
Cannot believe this hotel is rated as 4 star!  Our room was suppose to have 2 queen beds and if they were purchased as "queen size" they were ripped off.  The beds were no larger than double sized beds.  Our bathroom sink had 2 large cracks in it. Our "view" was the frontage road and trash dumpsters.  The hallway carpet was dirty.  Upon checking out, we checked under the bed for any forgotten items and there was trash from previous visitors.  The night before, we had ordered food from the restaurant to bring back to our room and it was cold.  Since there was no microwave (or refrigerator) there was nothing we could do. (Requesting them to replace it didn't seem like a good idea). By the way, to park your car in their parking lot is an additional $22.00!  Upon
 check-in, the desk clerk did wave that fee after telling us, we could park at the nearby golf course for free at which we had started to consider.
review.negativeRemarks: Way overpriced for what you get.......remodel or lower the price so you know what to expect.
review.locationRemarks: Close to SFO.

review.title: Close to airport.
review.reviewText:
Usual Warm "Hilton" Greetings with warm yummy cookie. Service with a smile. Accommodating. 
Nice atmosphere during the day and relaxing ambience in the evening. 
Only complaint is that they have a huge on premise parking lot surrounding the hotel, why charge a $22 parking fee to hotel guests?? It kind of left a sour taste.
Nice weekend stay.  Very comfortable, quiet and nice weekend live jazz ensemble downstairs.
review.negativeRemarks: Did not like the $22/night parking fee.  Asked to be comp-ed and it was.

review.title: Great Hotel
review.reviewText: Would definitely stay there again - the staff was friendly and the rooms were clean and beautiful!

review.title: Nice location for this hotel
review.reviewText: Fairly nice hotel with good food at the downstairs restaurant. Two gym spaces with enough equipment.
Friendly, helpful and accommodating hotel staff. Rooms are very clean with nice amenities. Clean, comfortable beds with nice linens. Likely to book at this hotel again.

review.title: I highly recommend this hotel
review.reviewText: The view of the Bay was nice and the ability to gain access and walk along the bay was unforgettable.  The food in the restaurant, the best I've had in a long time.  The chef has true vision and the selection of wine is divine.  Lastly, the staff was very friendly and helpful.  I have not one complaint.
review.negativeRemarks: I got nuthin.
review.locationRemarks: walk or jog along the bay, very close to the airport ~4miles, no need to leave their restaurant to eat but there is easy access to city transportation

review.title: Nice hotel, close to the airport
review.reviewText: It's a very good hotel overall for its class.  The hotel is clean and the hotel facilities seem to be well maintained.  The hotel room that I stayed in is of good size, clean, and the bed is comfortable.  It's very close to the airport with free shuttle service.  So, even if you are not driving, you can go to downtown San Francisco by taking the free shuttle service to the airport and then take the BART from the airport to downtown SF.  I highly recommend this hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: It's close to the airport and there is a free shuttle service to and from the airport.  It is also close to the bay, so the view is nice.
review.negativeRemarks: It would have been nice if there are free internet access and free parking but I guess it's common for hotels of its class (3.5 stars) to charge extra
review.locationRemarks: The location is close to the bay so the view is nice.  It is also close to the airport with free shuttle service.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport with free shuttle
review.reviewText: It's a comfortable trip in this hotel. Everything is clean and the staff are so nice.

review.title: Much better bang for the buck
review.reviewText: Hotels in downtown SF are filthy old and over priced. This hotel is 20-40 min from SF downtown and the same price as a super small hotel room in SF.

review.title: Not bad for the price
review.reviewText: The staff were very friendly, and we got free wi-fi. One weird thing is that when we returned to our room one night there's an additional bed in our room which we never asked for. So we had to leave it in the corridor for the night. So the communication among staff could be improved.

review.title: Nice - but some issues
review.reviewText: The Doubletree is usually a safe bet, but this stay was quite disappointing. The rooms were clean and the beds were comfortable. However, you have to pay extra for parking and the entrance gates didn't work. Also, we were awoken at 3 AM by construction trucks. I can't say our stay was restful at all.

review.title: Close to the shore.... Love the view.
review.reviewText: I am not at all impressed with the room cleanliness.
review.positiveRemarks: Front desk personnel was courteous and hospitable.
review.negativeRemarks: Room cleanliness needs improvement.
review.locationRemarks: Great shopping and great restaurants!

review.title: it so nice and the room is nice too
review.reviewText: i recomend it to everyone except no servuces close the hotel. also they have nice shuttel .

review.title: Great stay
review.reviewText: After 27 hours of travelling from Ireland we were very happy to arrive here. Great room and friendly staff. Amazing breakfast as well. Definitely would recommend

review.title: Comfortable stay
review.reviewText: Located near the airport and very convinient for taking early flight. Did not explore all facility but overall stay was good.

review.title: really convenient from airport, complimentary wifi
review.reviewText: Overall a satisfying reprief after a long flight into SFO. Lots of space to lounge around in lobby. Good business centre.

review.title: Very close to SFO airport with free hotel shuttle.
review.reviewText: This hotel was perfect for our overnight stay.  The front desk staff were very welcoming and efficient, and even presented us with their famous warm chocolate chip cookies.  Our room was spacious and clean; beds were very comfortable; and the bathroom was nice and big.  We appreciated the complimentary wifi and the availability of the very early morning free shuttle service to the airport.  Would definitely stay here again.
review.positiveRemarks: Proximity to the airport; free shuttle; free wifi
review.negativeRemarks: We were completely satisfied with this hotel.

review.reviewText: Very convenient for airport and BART train. On-time and comfortable shuttle.

review.title: Nice hotel for the money
review.reviewText: Good stay except not hot water in last two mornings.

review.title: EXCELLENT

PERFECT. GREAT. EXCELLENT. WILL COME BACK.
